live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience. A further update will be provided by 1:55pm
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56826.summary: Some customers in Westbank are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56826.title: Jan 7 - Westbank | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
